text: Jean-Pierre Mocky (6 July 1929 – 8 August 2019) pseudonym of Jean-Paul Adam Mokiejewski, was a French movie director, actor, screenwriter and producer. He was born in Nice, France. His 1987 movie Le Miraculé was entered into the 37th Berlin International Film Festival. He also directed Les Dragueurs and starred in the movie The Abandoned. Mocky died at his home in Paris of kidney failure on 8 August 2019 at the age of 90.Le réalisateur Jean-Pierre Mocky est mort ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:French movie actors Category:French movie directors Category:French movie producers Category:French screenwriters Category:Actors from Nice
title: Jean-Pierre Mocky
